thread.title: BRIEF-Professional Diversity Network says ‍On March 6, Jim Kirsch Notified Co Of His Intent To Resign As Co-Executive Chairman Of Board

title: BRIEF-Professional Diversity Network says ‍On March 6, Jim Kirsch Notified Co Of His Intent To Resign As Co-Executive Chairman Of Board
text: Market News March 8, 2018 / 5:56 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Professional Diversity Network says ‍On March 6, Jim Kirsch Notified Co Of His Intent To Resign As Co-Executive Chairman Of Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Professional Diversity Network Inc: * PROFESSIONAL DIVERSITY NETWORK- ‍ON MARCH 6, JIM KIRSCH NOTIFIED CO OF HIS INTENT TO RESIGN AS CO-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN OF BOARD - SEC FILING​ * PROFESSIONAL DIVERSITY NETWORK- ‍FOLLOWING KIRSCH S RESIGNATION AS CO-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN HE SHALL CONTINUE TO SERVE AS DIRECTOR, NON-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN Source text - bit.ly/2IdNSXI Further company coverage:
